Needlehole Cherry Blossom

The idea is to provide a generic module for window based time domain processes. There's only one process at the moment which is a median filter. In image processing you use median filtering to remove noise, it has a kind of low pass filtering characteristic. Thus, by specifying a very short window length like one or two milliseconds and subtracting the dry signal, you kind a very need insectoid highpass filter. that's all.
